title: Want to Buy: 1899-00 M101-1 Sporting News Supplements HOF'ers

posts.post_title: Want to Buy: 1899-00 M101-1 Sporting News Supplements HOF'ers
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Phil Garry
I am looking to buy one example each at very strong prices for several Hall of Famers that I need from this set. If you have any HOF'ers for sale, please e-mail me privately at: vguerrerobb@yahoo.com

Thanks
